alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 6:18PM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sauk River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Very low roadways may be impacted from Richmond to St. Cloud; water reaching foundations of a few homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 515 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 6.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 03/27/1957. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
